title: Midnight Murders
description:
On New Years Eve many people stayed up until midnight to ring in the new year. But at night, when the moon comes out so do the ghosts, evil doers, and demons. In the cover of darkness they’re free to go about tormenting whoever they want. So while some might have been celebrating at midnight, for others it brought murder and mayhem.

First, warnings from the lighthouse Followed by murderous jealousy
Then, a house full of horrors
Finally in our featured story, the desire to kill

Ready to awaken your inner detective? Download June’s Journey free today on the Apple App Store or Google Play!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
